title: Shankly's 2008 Mixtapes - June
description:
Shankly is off on his holidays from tomorrow, so the June edition of the world&#039;s trendiest music is out a few days early. But hey! That just means that means that you get new music from Primal Scream, the Dirty Pretty Things, Dr. Dog, Iron and Wine, Micah P Hinson, Glasvegas, Von Sudenfed and iLiKETRAiNS a week or so before anyone else! 

Loads of great cover tracks on this month&#039;s offering, the Majestic High&#039;s Lu Zhong reworking of the Cutter is particularly highly recommended. As for the segue between the Venetian Snares and These New Puritans, John Peel would be proud! 

Hats off to Shankly!

3.	Primal Scream - Cant Go Back
4.	Dirty Pretty Things - Tired Of England
